snippet: Israel Idonije is hoping to spend his 12th N.F.L. season as a defensive lineman with the Giants, but he also has a promising career as the creator of a comic book series.
abstract: New York Giants defensive lineman Israel Idonije, facing uncertain future in his 12th season in the NFL, has crafted a promising new career as the creator of a comic book series; has produced two volumes of The Protectors with writer Ron Marz and artist Bart Sears, and series has already started to make waves.
lead_paragraph: Israel Idonije is hoping to spend his 12th N.F.L. season as a defensive lineman with the Giants, but he also has a promising career as the creator of a comic book series.

headline.seo: Giants' Israel Idonije Finds Success in Comic Books
headline.main: No Longer an Impact Player, a Giant Finds a Way to Deliver a Kaboom
headline.print_headline: No Longer an Impact Player, a Giant Finds a Way to Deliver a Kaboom
